name: PlanetHopper (Skydra)
description:
Controls:

  • A/Arrow Left = Run Left
  • D/Arrow Right = Run Right
  • S/Arrow Down = Sense (Views connections between Objects)
  • Space = Jump

HINT: You need to use the Sense Feature at some point of the Game.

Astronaut Neil Footweak accidentally dropped out of his spaceship X. Stuck on Lapis Silva his only way to survive until his colleagues will pick him up - how long will he survive?

Prepare for a different adventure where your previous mistakes may hunt you forever.

The mission was simple - take some samples and return at 0100 to the airship. But after he misses his pickup he is stuck, challenged to do his biggest fear - walking and jumping. It seems like it never going to end and the mistakes he makes somehow hunt him in the next round.
